name: graph.js
title: Javascript Graph Datastructure
description: a javascript library for storing arbitrary data in mathematical (di)graphs, as well as traversing and analyzing them in various ways (ECMAScript 6 Ready)
author: Michiel Helvensteijn <mhelvens@gmail.com> (http://mhelvens.net)

scripts.pp: npm run build && npm run docs && npm run test
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp src/graph.es6.js dist && webpack && uglifyjs dist/graph.js -mo dist/graph.min.js --in-source-map dist/graph.js.map --source-map dist/graph.min.js.map && uglifyjs dist/graph.full.js -mo dist/graph.full.min.js --in-source-map dist/graph.full.js.map --source-map dist/graph.full.min.js.map
